thread.title: Trump: Researcher Who Found No Widespread Voter Fraud Is 'Groveling'
thread.title_full: Trump: Researcher Who Found No Widespread Voter Fraud Is 'Groveling'

author: Caitlin MacNeal
title: Trump: Researcher Who Found No Widespread Voter Fraud Is 'Groveling'
text:
In an interview with ABC News' David Muir that aired on Wednesday night, President Donald Trump defended his debunked claims that millions of people voted illegally in the 2016 election and attacked the author of a study who found that there is not widespread voter fraud in the United States.
Muir told Trump that his claim that three to five people voted illegally have been "debunked," telling Trump that a Pew report he has cited does not provide evidence of widespread fraud.
